Hydroponic vegetables grown in underused office space

Employees are demanding more from their office spaces while being there less. Fruitful spaces aims to bring a stronger sense of community while tackling food mileage by growing food and herbs in underutilised office spaces. This IoT enabled hydroponic system produces anything from herbs to full tomatoes to spicy chillis.
